visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)

componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: A Cancel and Replace (C&R) process is in progress for this account. In-flight opportunities tied to the contract being canceled/replaced may be restricted from quote approval or submission to Closing. Please complete the C&R process before proceeding with other opportunities.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7

componentInstanceProperties.name: multipleWorkflowHelpText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Start an intake form for a new Ironclad contract.

componentInstanceProperties.name: noWorkflowHelpText
componentInstanceProperties.value: No Ironclad contract intake forms are available.

componentInstanceProperties.name: singleWorkflowHelpText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Start an intake form for a new {workflow}.
